movie.title: Blood Mania
movie.description_intro: A sex-crazed nympho helps speed along her father's death so she can use the inheritance to help out her depraved boyfriend.
movie.description_full: A sex-crazed nympho helps speed along her father's death so she can use the inheritance to help out her depraved boyfriend.

movies.title: 30 Miles from Nowhere
movies.summary: When five college pals return to rural Wisconsin for their estranged friend's funeral, what begins as an uneasy reunion becomes a terrifying fight for survival.
movies.description_full: When five college pals return to rural Wisconsin for their estranged friend's funeral, what begins as an uneasy reunion becomes a terrifying fight for survival.
movies.synopsis: When five college pals return to rural Wisconsin for their estranged friend's funeral, what begins as an uneasy reunion becomes a terrifying fight for survival.

movies.title: Starship Troopers 2: Hero of the Federation
movies.title_english: Starship Troopers 2: Hero of the Federation
movies.title_long: Starship Troopers 2: Hero of the Federation (2004)
movies.summary: We are sent back to the battlefield, as the Federation's best Mobile Infantry unit are slowly being overpowered by the killer bugs. They are light years from the nearest reinforcements and are trapped on a remote outpost. They set up protection around the post, keeping all the bugs waiting for them to leave. But now the enemy is in the outpost, in a way which they would have never thought of.

But now the enemy is in the outpost, in a way which they would have never thought of.

movies.title: Blue Vengeance
movies.summary: Considered too dangerous to be on the force, ex-cop Mickey McCardle is tormented by the brutal murder of his partner. When a serial killer begins to stalk the streets of New York, McCardle senses that the same man responsible for his partner's death is to blame. Obsessed by his suspicions, McCardle must rise from the shambles of his life and take up a trail of revenge.

movies.title: Black Cat
movies.summary: A woman and her daughter-in-law are raped and murdered by samurais during the time of civil war. Afterwards, a series of samurai returning from the war through that area are found mysteriously dead with their throats torn out. The governor calls in a wild and fierce young hero, to quell what is evidently a ghost. He encounters the two beautiful women, in an eerie, beautiful scene. After spiritual purification, he meets the demon in a thrilling fight.
